pages.text: $(8)Thanks to Sharon Hurvitz for allowing me to implement one of her magnificent songs into the mod! $(br2)If you have the chance, take a deeper look into her work and her music!
pages.title: Generations

pages.text: $(8) $(br2)''Sharon Hurvitz is a mastering engineer and composer, known for her immersive sonic environments and intricate, imaginative scores. Her work ranges from soft minimalistic touches, to grand and driving orchestral music.''
pages.title: Sharon Hurvitz
